o:MethodTargetItem.a:Name: mdde_ParentSourceObjectAndAttributeEdit
o:MethodTargetItem.a:Creator: WesselsH1
o:MethodTargetItem.a:MethodScript:
' Create a selection object on all source objects, except the source object of the current condition. ' Show the object picker on the selection and store the selected one. Sub %Method%(obj) Dim objSel : Set objSel = obj.Model.CreateSelection
If Not(objSel Is Nothing) Then Dim objJoin For Each objJoin in obj.Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.getExtendedCollection("mdde_SourceObjects") ' Skip the current source object (so the parent of the current condition. If (objJoin.ObjectID <> obj.Parent.Parent.ObjectID) Then objSel.Objects.Add objJoin End If Next
' Display the object picker on the selection Dim objParentSourceObject : Set objParentSourceObject = objSel.ShowObjectPicker ' Remove the selection. objSel.Delete
' If a source object was choosen, show an object picker to choose an attribute of the joined object. If Not (objParentSourceObject Is Nothing) Then Dim objParentEntity : Set objParentEntity = objParentSourceObject.GetExtendedAttribute("mdde_JoinedObject") Dim objParentAttribute : Set objParentAttribute = SelectOutputAttribute(objParentEntity) ' If an attribute was selected, store the choosen parent source object and attribute. If Not(objParentAttribute Is Nothing) Then obj.SetExtendedAttribute "mdde_ParentSourceObject", objParentSourceObject obj.SetExtendedAttribute "mdde_ParentAttribute", objParentAttribute ' Empty the literal value, since there is a attribute reference now. obj.SetExtendedAttribute "mdde_ParentLiteralValue", Nothing End If End If End If
End Sub
